if-you-have-questions-please-call-us-wer: If you have questions, please call us at <0></0> (<1></1>). We’re here 24/7.
if-you-need-to-make-changes-please-talk-: If you need to make changes, please talk to a staff member when you check in.
if-you-need-to-submit-receipts-for-other: If you need to submit receipts for other expenses like tolls, meals, or lodging, you can’t file a claim now. But you can file your claim online 24/7 through the Beneficiary Travel Self Service System (BTSSS). Or you can use VA Form 10-3542 to submit a claim by mail, fax, email, or in person.
if-you-need-to-talk-to-someone-right-awa: If you need to talk to someone right away or need emergency care,
if-you-traveled-by-bus-train-taxi-or-oth: If you traveled by bus, train, taxi, or other authorized public transportation, you can’t file a claim now. But you can file your claim online 24/7 through the Beneficiary Travel Self Service System (BTSSS). Or you can use VA Form 10-3542 to submit a claim by mail, fax, email, or in person.
if-you-traveled-from-a-different-address: If you traveled from a different address, you can’t file a claim now. But you can file your claim online 24/7 through the Beneficiary Travel Self Service System (BTSSS). Or you can use VA Form 10-3542 to submit a claim by mail, fax, email, or in person.

this-helps-us-keep-information-about-you: This helps us keep information about your next of kin up to date.
privacy-act-statement-text: We ask you to provide the information in this questionnaire to help with your medical care (under law 38 U.S.C. Chapter 17). It’s your choice if you want to provide this information. If you choose not to provide this information, it may make it harder for us to prepare for your visit. But it won’t have any effect on your eligibility for any VA benefits or services. We may use and share the information you provide in this questionnaire in the ways we’re allowed to by law. We may make a “routine use” disclosure of the information as outlined in the Privacy Act system of records notice in “24VA10A7 Patient Medical Record – VA” and following the Veterans Health Administration (VHA) Notice of Privacy Practices.
we-can-better-follow-up-with-when-we-hav: We can better follow up with you after your appointment when we have your current information.
we-can-better-prepare-for-your-appointme: We can better prepare for your appointment and contact you more easily.
we-make-every-effort-to-keep-your-person: We make every effort to keep your personal information private and secure.
we-need-some-information-to-verify-your-: We need some information to verify your identity so we can check you in.
we-need-to-verify-your-identity-so-you-c: We need to verify your identity so you can start pre-check-in.
well-get-you-from-waiting-room-when-time: We’ll come get you from the waiting room when it’s time for your appointment to start.
if-you-wait-more-than: If you wait more than 15 minutes, tell a staff member.
were-sorry-something-went-wrong-on-our-e: We’re sorry. Something went wrong on our end. Check in with a staff member.
We’re sorry. Something went wrong on our end. Please try again.
were-sorry-we-couldnt-match-your-informa: We’re sorry. We couldn’t match your information to our records. Please ask a staff member for help.

why-do-i-need-to-make-sure-my-informatio: Why do I need to make sure my information is up to date?

you-can-check-in-starting-at-this-time: You can check in starting at {{date, time}}
you-can-pre-check-in-online-until-date: You can pre-check in online until {{date, mdY}}.
you-can-still-check-in-once-you-arrive: You can still check-in with your phone once you arrive at your appointment.
you-can-sign-in-to-your-va-gov-profile: You can <0>{{link}}</0> to your VA.gov profile to update your contact information online.
you-may-need-to-wait: You may need to wait about 15 minutes for their call. Thanks for your patience.
your-answers-will-help-us-better-prepare: Your answers will help us better prepare for your needs.
your-appointment-started-more-than-15-mi: Your appointment started more than 15 minutes ago. We can’t check you in online. Ask a staff member for help.

your-appointments-on-day-facility_other: Your appointments are on {{day, long}} at {{facility}}.

your-date-of-birth-can-not-be-in-the-fut: Your date of birth can not be in the future
youre-also-responsible-for-protecting-yo: You’re also responsible for protecting your personal health information. If you print or download your information—or share it electronically with others—you’ll need to take steps to protect it.
you-can-pre-check-in-online-before-midni: You can pre-check-in online before midnight of the day of your appointment.
during-pre-check-in-you-can-review-your-: During pre-check-in, you can review your personal, emergency contact, and next of kin information and confirm it’s up to date. This helps us better prepare for your appointment.
you-can-also-sign-in-to-your-va-gov-prof: You can also <0>{{link}}</0> to your VA.gov profile to review your information.
sign-in-to-manage: Sign in to manage all appointments
sorry-we-couldnt-find-an-account-that-ma: We’re sorry. We couldn’t find an account that matches that last name or date of birth. Please try again.
were-sorry-we-couldnt-match-your-informa: We’re sorry. We couldn’t match your information to our records.
you-can-still-check-in-with-your-phone-o: You can still check-in with your phone on the day of your appointment.
we-encourage-you-to-file-travel-reimburs: We encourage you to try filing your claim now--even if you're not sure that you're eligible. We'll ask you 3 more questions. This can help you file your claim faster.
would-you-like-to-file-a-travel-reimburs: Would you like to file a travel reimbursement claim now?
you-can-also-file-a-claim-online--help-t: You can also file a claim online 24/7 through the Beneficiary Travel Self Service System (BTSSS). Or you can use VA Form 10-3542 to submit a claim by mail, fax, email, or in person. Be sure to file your claim on time. You must file within <0>30 days</0> of the appointment.
your-provider-will-call-you-at-your-appo: Your provider will call you at your appointment time. You may need to wait about 15 minutes for their call. Thanks for your patience.
received-reimbursement-claim: And we received your travel claim.
we-couldnt-file-reimbursement: But we couldn't file your travel claim.
you-created-a-travel-claim-already: You've created a travel claim already.
check-travel-claim-status: You can check the status of your travel reimbursement claim online 24/7 on the Beneficiary Travel Self Service System (BTSSS). You can access BTSSS through the AccessVA travel claim portal.
sorry-something-went-wrong-on-our-end-wi: We’re sorry, something went wrong on our end. We can't file a travel reimbursement claim for you now. But you can still file within <0>30 days</0> of the appointment.
travel-pay-cant-file-message: We’re sorry. We can’t file this type of travel reimbursement claim for you now. But you can still file within <0>30 days</0> of the appointment.
find-out-if-youre-eligible--link: Find out if you’re eligible and how to file for travel reimbursement
for-questions-about-your-appointment: <0>For questions about your appointment or if you have a health-related concern,</0> ask a staff member at your VA health facility.
for-questions-about-travel-reimbursement: <0>For questions about travel reimbursement and filing a claim,</0> call your VA health facility's Beneficiary Travel contact.
find-the-travel-contact-for-your-facilit: Find the travel contact for your facility
or-call-our-BTSSS-toll-free-call-center: Or call our BTSSS toll-free call center at <0></0> (<1></1>). We're here Monday through Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. ET.
travel-pay-reimbursement--info-message: VA travel pay reimbursement pays eligible Veterans and caregivers back for mileage and other travel expenses to and from approved health care appointments.
find-out-how-to-file--link: Find out how to file for travel reimbursement
pre-check-in-no-longer-available--info-m: We’re sorry. Pre-check-in is no longer available for your appointment time. Ask a staff member for help to check in.

were-sorry-cant-file-travel-file-later--: We’re sorry. We can’t file a travel reimbursement claim for you now. But you can still file within <0>30 days</0> of the appointment.
processing-travel-claim: <0>We’re processing your travel reimbursement claim.</0> We’ll send you a text to let you know the status of your claim.
